description.value:
Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

Use 1 metamagic action that you can perform that normally takes 1 action and can be applied to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} spell. If you use it in this way, its effects apply only to a harm or heal spell.
